This _+2 greater striking [flaming](/Equipment.aspx?ID=295) [longsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=31)_ has an ornate brass hilt and a blade shaped like stylized flames. When wielded, the blade projects illumination resembling shimmering firelight, emitting dim light in a 10-foot radius.
